Package fr.univlille.iutinfo.view

Class MazeViewHunter

java.lang.Object
fr.univlille.iutinfo.view.MazeViewHunter
public abstract class MazeViewHunter extends Object
The MazeViewHunter class is responsible for generating the visual representation of the maze for the hunter entity.

    • initPane

      public static javafx.scene.layout.StackPane initPane(Maze maze, Hunter hunter, boolean whoPlays, int turn, int x, int y, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane grid, MazeView mv)
      Creates a Pane at the given coordinates and set its actions.

      A Pane represents a cell in the maze.

      Parameters:
      maze - The maze
      hunter - The hunter entity
      whoPlays - If the hunter can play
      turn - The current turn
      x - The x-axis of the maze
      y - The y-axis of the maze
      grid - The javafx maze display
      mv - The maze view

      The Pane
